statements: DELETE FROM quality_control WHERE non_conformance = 'Major issue'
DELETE FROM quality_control WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' AND non_conformance = 'Minor';
DELETE FROM quality_control WHERE non_conformance = 'Major' AND inspection_result = 'Fail';
DELETE FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_type = 'Critical' AND non_conformance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_type = 'Major' AND non_conformance_description LIKE '%critical%';
DELETE FROM non_conformances WHERE nc_id = 100 AND action_taken = 'Corrective Action';
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date < '2021-06-01' AND inspector_id = 5000;
DELETE FROM non_conformances WHERE description = 'Missing parts';
DELETE FROM non_conformances WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
